commit.message:
Auto merge of #105617 - bjorn3:update_crossbeam, r=Mark-Simulacrum

Update crossbeam

This fixes builds for Gentoo

This should fix https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/104866 (cc `@stefson)`
